resources.string:
Customer Information (“Customer Information”) includes, but is not limited to:
Information you provide to the Company:
This information includes, but is not limited to, first and last name, email address, phone number, shipping address, bank account and payment information, information on forms, declarations, applications, surveys, feedback or complaint forms (whether online or otherwise), information submitted by or made available through the devices used to access the WEBSITE, or information that you customers actively send to the Company. Information obtained as a result of your interaction with the Company:
This information includes any other information about you when you communicate with the Company by any means (telephone, mail, fax, face-to-face, email, social media, applications). use), log in and use the Products - Services or interact through the WEBSITE, including how you used them. Information about you that the Company aggregates or obtains from other sources (if any).

When using the Products - Services and/or interacting with the Company, you acknowledge and agree that you accept the provisions of this Privacy Policy, and you consent to the Company collecting, use, disclose and/or process Customer Information in accordance with the provisions described herein. IN THE CASE OF YOU DO NOT AGREE WITH THIS PRIVACY POLICY, YOU MAY CONSIDER STOP PROVIDING CUSTOMER INFORMATION TO THE COMPANY; LOG IN YOUR ACCOUNT TO CHECK, UPDATE, ADJUST CUSTOMER INFORMATION OR REQUEST THE COMPANY TO DO THIS. This privacy policy may be amended and supplemented to improve from time to time, the Company encourages you to review it regularly to be updated and protect your rights.
Do you want to exit the application?
Are you sure you want to delete?
